data.text: Ao, sɛ anka wobɛsunsuane ɔsorosoro mu, asiane aba fam a,
Na ɛberɛ a woyɛɛ nneɛma a ɛyɛ nwanwa a yɛanhwɛ anim no,
Woboa wɔn a wɔde anigyeɛ yɛ deɛ ɛtene,
Yɛn nyinaa ayɛ sɛ obi a ne ho nteɛ,
Nanso, Ao Awurade, wo ne yɛn Agya.
Mma wo bo mfu ntra so, Ao Awurade;
Wo nkuropɔn kronkron no adane anweatam;
Yɛn asɔredan kronkron a ɛwɔ animuonyam, faako a yɛn nananom yii wo ayɛ no,
Yei nyinaa akyi, Ao Awurade wo de wo ho bɛkame yɛn anaa?
